question.title: What is the characteristic of a melanoma tumour that is NOT a hallmark of this particular image?
question.description: The image shows a melanoma tumour with the following features: asymmetric shape, irregular margins, heterogeneous colour, and a diameter of 18mm. What is NOT a characteristic of this image?

option_a.title: Symmetric shape
option_a.description: A common feature of many skin lesions, including melanoma

option_d.title: Uniform diameter
option_d.description: A common feature of many skin lesions, including melanoma
